ticket.title: Add basic assertions to core_ext
ticket.original-body: The following patch defines a bunch of convenience assertions for general testing purposes. We've got assert_contains, assert_does_not_contain, assert_empty, assert_false/true (aliases), assert_array_contents_match, assert_includes (alias), assert_does_not_include (alias), and assert_not_contains (alias)
ticket.latest-body: The following patch defines a bunch of convenience assertions for general testing purposes. We've got assert_contains, assert_does_not_contain, assert_empty, assert_false/true (aliases), assert_array_contents_match, assert_includes (alias), assert_does_not_include (alias), and assert_not_contains (alias)
ticket.original-body-html: The following patch defines a bunch of convenience assertions for general testing purposes. We've got assert_contains, assert_does_not_contain, assert_empty, assert_false/true (aliases), assert_array_contents_match, assert_includes (alias), assert_does_not_include (alias), and assert_not_contains (alias)

version.body: The following patch defines a bunch of convenience assertions for general testing purposes. We've got assert_contains, assert_does_not_contain, assert_empty, assert_false/true (aliases), assert_array_contents_match, assert_includes (alias), assert_does_not_include (alias), and assert_not_contains (alias)
version.body-html: The following patch defines a bunch of convenience assertions for general testing purposes. We've got assert_contains, assert_does_not_contain, assert_empty, assert_false/true (aliases), assert_array_contents_match, assert_includes (alias), assert_does_not_include (alias), and assert_not_contains (alias)
version.title: Add basic assertions to core_ext

version.body: We used to have a very full-fledged set of assets, but cut them down because the value they offered wasn't worth the hassle of trying to figure out when to use what. assert array.empty?, "shouldn't be empty" works just as well as assert_empty, imo.
version.body-html: We used to have a very full-fledged set of assets, but cut them down because the value they offered wasn't worth the hassle of trying to figure out when to use what. assert array.empty?, "shouldn't be empty" works just as well as assert_empty, imo.
version.title: Add basic assertions to core_ext

version.title: Add basic assertions to core_ext

version.body: This supra footwear is called a modern vintage and has been since their introduction in 2003 where they began in Europe. Every supra shoes has some type of ornament, adornment or hardware and is comprised of aged leather that is bought from around the world. These supra uk are culturally engaging and allow for the woman wearing them to be enveloped in luxury.With new cuts and styles and hand stitched shoes, these timberland boots, heels or flats will make every foot look like it stepped out of vintage Hollywood. This timberland shoes have been worn and coveted by many of the most famous females in recent history. One such coach outlet, Jennifer Aniston, wears them in public and at home.This company makes many different unique styles of bags outlet from ankle booties to sandals, pumps, moncler jackets online, platforms and wedges. One louis vuitton bag in particular is ideal for the gothic style sense; it is patent leather and laces up the front of the shaft. There are also zippers on each side, and this shoe offers a flat heel of a half inch.Another great moncler jackets sale is featured in People's Style Watch and is called a platform bootie. This ture religion jeans has a raised panel in front of the ankle as well as a heel that measures 4.5 inches. The front offers a leather bandage appearance and is considered high fashion.
